result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

of Sentencing Hearing on Revocation - includes 12CF284, 13CF622, 14CF224, 14CF687, 14CF690 - filed in 14CF224

State moves to:

14CF224 - Ct. 2 (Poss w/Intent THC/Rpeater)>>NO CONTEST
14CF224 - Ct. 3 (Maintain Drug Trafficking place/PTAC/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST
14CF224 - Ct. 5 (Poss Methamphetamine Para)>>NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.

COURT ORDERS: 
(SEHR)
12CF284 - Cts 1 and 2>> 4 years TOTAL, concurrent to each other and to all other sentences: 2 years incarceration and 2 years ES - 287 days credit on each count.
CONDITIONS: Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; CC; Payment of any outstanding financial obligations.

(PLEA/SENT)
14CF224 -Cts. 2, 3, 5>>4 years TOTAL, concurrent to each other and to all other sentences: 2 years incarceration and 2 years ES - 652 days credit on each count.
CONDITIONS: GFE to obtain/maintain  FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate.

(SEHR)
13CF622 - 2 years TOTAL, concurrent to all other counts: 1 year incarceration and 1 years ES - 652 days credit on each count.
CONDITIONS:  (same as in 12CF284)
